means: module description language 模块描述语言

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"复制品"之意。
means: copy ： 普通用词，含义广泛，指精确的或不精确的复制品。
duplicate ： 常指完全一模一样，可代替原件的复制品。
model ： 可指按某物式样制造、按比例缩小的模型，也可指某物未制成之前做出的模型。
reproduction ： 批按原物复制的产品，着重复制品与原物相似。
facsimile ： 含义与copy大体相同，但较文雅。

word_mean: 模式，模型：具代表性的东西，如作诊断或解剖研究的模型

sentence.Network_en: He wants companies to follow the European model of social responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望各公司能够以欧洲公司为榜样，承担社会责任。

sentence.Network_en: The functionalist model of industrial society was subjected to conceptual criticism.
sentence.Network_cn: 工业社会的实用主义模型在概念上遭到了批判。

sentence.Network_en: This basic utilitarian model gives a relatively unsophisticated account of human behaviour.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个实用的基础模型较为简略地解释了人类的行为。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a set of plans of a building): from French modelle, from Italian modello, from an alteration of Latin modulus (see modulus)

entry.def: A model of an object is a physical representation that shows what it looks like or how it works. The model is often smaller than the object it represents.

example.ex: ...an architect's model of a wooden house.
example.tran: 一幢木屋的建筑模型

example.ex: ...a working scale model of the whole Bay Area...
example.tran: 实际应用的整个旧金山湾区比例模型

entry.def: A model is a system that is being used and that people might want to copy in order to achieve similar results.

example.ex: We believe that this is a general model of managerial activity...
example.tran: 我们认为这可以作为管理活动的普遍范例。

example.ex: He wants companies to follow the European model of social responsibility.
example.tran: 他希望各公司能够以欧洲公司为榜样，承担社会责任。

entry.def: A model of a system or process is a theoretical description that can help you understand how the system or process works, or how it might work.

example.ex: Darwin eventually put forward a model of biological evolution...
example.tran: 达尔文最终提出了生物进化的模型。

example.ex: He proposed a model of stress reaction in the body.
example.tran: 他提出了一个人体内应激反应的模型。

entry.tran: 创立(系统或过程）的（理论描述)模型
entry.def: If someone such as a scientist models a system or process, they make an accurate theoretical description of it in order to understand or explain how it works.

example.ex: ...the mathematics needed to model a nonlinear system like an atmosphere.
example.tran: 创立诸如大气层之类的非线性系统的模型所需的数学知识

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is a model of a particular quality, you are showing approval of them because they have that quality to a large degree.

example.ex: A model of good manners, he has conquered any inward fury...
example.tran: 作为一个非常懂礼貌的人，他已经学会了克制内心的任何愤怒情绪。

example.ex: His marriage and family life is a model of propriety.
example.tran: 他的婚姻和家庭生活都是规规矩矩的。

entry.def: You use model to express approval of someone when you think that they perform their role or duties extremely well.

example.ex: As a girl she had been a model pupil...
example.tran: 还是个小女孩的时候，她就是一个模范学生。

example.ex: Hospital staff say he is a model patient.
example.tran: 医务人员说他是一个模范病人。

entry.tran: 按特定模型制造;仿特定样式做出
entry.def: If one thing is modelled on another, the first thing is made so that it is like the second thing in some way.

example.ex: The quota system was modelled on those operated in America and continental Europe...
example.tran: 该配额制度是仿照美国以及欧洲大陆国家的同类制度制定的。

example.ex: The program will be modeled after a popular BBC series called 'The Archers'...
example.tran: 这个节目将仿照英国广播公司的人气系列剧《阿彻一家》制作。

entry.def: If you model yourself on someone, you copy the way that they do things, because you admire them and want to be like them.

example.ex: There's absolutely nothing wrong in modelling yourself on an older woman...
example.tran: 以年纪较长的女性作为自己仿效的对象绝没有什么不对。

example.ex: They will tend to model their behaviour on the teacher's behaviour.
example.tran: 他们会倾向于模仿老师的行为举止。

entry.def: A particular model of a machine is a particular version of it.

example.ex: To keep the cost down, opt for a basic model...
example.tran: 要想花钱少些，就选择基本的型号。

example.ex: The model number is 1870/285.
example.tran: 该型号的编号为1870/285。

entry.def: An artist's model is a person who stays still in a particular position so that the artist can make a picture or sculpture of them.
If someone models for an artist, they stay still in a particular position so that the artist can make a picture or sculpture  of them.

example.ex: Tullio has been modelling for Sandra for eleven years.
example.tran: 图利奥已为桑德拉做了11年的模特儿。

entry.def: A fashion model is a person whose job is to display clothes by wearing them.

example.ex: ...Paris's top photographic fashion model.
example.tran: 巴黎顶尖时装摄影模特儿

entry.def: If someone models clothes, they display them by wearing them.

example.ex: I wasn't here to model clothes...
example.tran: 我不是到这里来当时装模特儿的。

example.ex: She began modelling in Paris aged 15.
example.tran: 她15岁就开始在巴黎做时装模特儿。

entry.tran: (用黏土、木头等)做…的模型;塑造
entry.def: If you model shapes or figures, you make them out of a substance such as clay or wood.

example.ex: There she began to model in clay...
example.tran: 在那儿她开始用黏土做模型。

example.ex: Sometimes she carved wood and sometimes stone; sometimes she modelled clay...
example.tran: 她有时刻木雕，有时刻石雕，有时塑泥塑。

means.word_mean: 1. a simplified description of a complex entity or process;

sentences.sentence: "the computer program was based on a model of the circulatory and respiratory systems"

means.word_mean: 3. a person who poses for a photographer or painter or sculptor;

sentences.sentence: "the president didn't have time to be a model so the artist worked from photos"

means.word_mean: 4. representation of something (sometimes on a smaller scale)

sentences.sentence: "he is the very model of a modern major general"

means.word_mean: 8. a woman who wears clothes to display fashions;

sentences.sentence: "she was too fat to be a mannequin"

means.word_mean: 9. the act of representing something (usually on a smaller scale)
1. plan or create according to a model or models
3. assume a posture as for artistic purposes;

sentences.sentence: "We don't know the woman who posed for Leonardo so often"

means.word_mean: 5. create a representation or model of;

sentences.sentence: "The pilots are trained in conditions simulating high-altitude flights"

auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, we wanted to adopt a client-server model.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, we wanted to adopt a client-server model.

auth_sentence.content: Others have switched their mortgage to a repayment model.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others have switched their mortgage to a repayment model.

Sentence.sentence: The traditional textbook model is and has been broken for quite some time.
This emerging model is now big and disruptive (颠覆性的) enough for regulators and companies to have woken up to it

We might look to other countries for models of how high schools can offer better training, as well as the development of a work ethic ( 勤奋工作的美德 ) and the intellectual skills needed for continued learning and development.

sentences.en: This is the model of the proposed new airport.
sentences.cn: 这就是拟建的新机场模型。

sentences.en: This is the most popular model in our whole range.
sentences.cn: 这是我们产品中最受欢迎的型号。

sentences.en: The nation's constitution provided a model that other countries follow.
sentences.cn: 该国的宪法提供了他国效法的模式。

sentences.en: Make a model of your father, and you will become a fine man.
sentences.cn: 以你的父亲为榜样, 你就会成为一个杰出的人。

sentences.en: She is one of the country's top models.
sentences.cn: 她是全国的顶尖模特儿之一。

sentences.en: She was too fat to model.
It is possible to model such a system mathematically.
sentences.cn: 做出这种系统的数学模型是可能的。

sentences.en: The famous figure was modelled by the students.
sentences.cn: 这位著名的人物受到学生们的崇拜。

sentences.en: Angela is modelling an attractive blue silk dress.
sentences.cn: 安吉拉做模特儿向顾客展示一种漂亮的蓝色丝绸服装。

jushi.english: The model shows the whole project of the irrigation system.
jushi.chinese: 这个模型展示该灌溉系统的全貌。

jushi.english: All this year's new models are displayed at the motor show.
jushi.chinese: 汽车展览会上展出了今年所有的新型号。
